datasets.name: 54b0bbdd
datasets.displayName: Chit Payment Discounts by Provider Analysis
queryLines:
select
cl.chit_name, 
cpp.provider_name, 
cl.monthly_amount, 
cp.payment_date,
(cl.chit_amount - (cp.bid_amount - (cl.chit_amount * cl.commision))) / cl.total_tenure as discount,
cl.monthly_amount - (cl.chit_amount - (cp.bid_amount - (cl.chit_amount * cl.commision))) / cl.total_tenure as paid_amount,
((cl.chit_amount - (cp.bid_amount - (cl.chit_amount * cl.commision))) / cl.chit_amount) as absolute_returns_percentage
from personal_finance.default.chit_payments cp
join personal_finance.default.chit_list cl on cp.chit_id = cl.chit_id
join personal_finance.default.chit_providers cpp on cpp.provider_id = cl.provider_id

datasets.name: ad8bdf35
queryLines:
with latest_nav as (
    select fund_id, nav as latest_nav, date as latest_date
    from personal_finance.default.mf_historical_data as a
    where date = (
        select max(date)
        from personal_finance.default.mf_historical_data as b
        where a.fund_id = b.fund_id
    )
),
nav_7_days_ago as (
    select fund_id, nav as nav_7d
    from personal_finance.default.mf_historical_data as a
    where date = (
        select max(date)
        from personal_finance.default.mf_historical_data as b
        where a.fund_id = b.fund_id
        and b.date <= current_date - interval '7' day
    )
),
nav_14_days_ago as (
    select fund_id, nav as nav_14d
    from personal_finance.default.mf_historical_data as a
    where date = (
        select max(date)
        from personal_finance.default.mf_historical_data as b
        where a.fund_id = b.fund_id
        and b.date <= current_date - interval '14' day
    )
),
nav_30_days_ago as (
    select fund_id, nav as nav_30d
    from personal_finance.default.mf_historical_data as a
    where date = (
        select max(date)
        from personal_finance.default.mf_historical_data as b
        where a.fund_id = b.fund_id
        and b.date <= current_date - interval '30' day
    )
),
units_summary as (
    select fund_id, sum(units) as total_units
    from personal_finance.default.mf_payments
    group by fund_id
)

select 
    mf.fund_name,
    mf.fund_house,
    us.total_units,
    round(ln.latest_nav * us.total_units, 2) as current_value,
    round(n7.nav_7d * us.total_units, 2) as value_7d_ago,
    round(n14.nav_14d * us.total_units, 2) as value_14d_ago,
    round(n30.nav_30d * us.total_units, 2) as value_30d_ago,

    round((ln.latest_nav * us.total_units) - (n7.nav_7d * us.total_units), 2) as profit_7_days,
    round((ln.latest_nav * us.total_units) - (n14.nav_14d * us.total_units), 2) as profit_14_days,
    round((ln.latest_nav * us.total_units) - (n30.nav_30d * us.total_units), 2) as profit_30_days,

    round(((ln.latest_nav * us.total_units) - (n7.nav_7d * us.total_units)) / nullif(n7.nav_7d * us.total_units, 0), 8) as perf_7_days_percentage,
    round(((ln.latest_nav * us.total_units) - (n14.nav_14d * us.total_units)) / nullif(n14.nav_14d * us.total_units, 0), 8) as perf_14_days_percentage,
    round(((ln.latest_nav * us.total_units) - (n30.nav_30d * us.total_units)) / nullif(n30.nav_30d * us.total_units, 0), 8) as perf_30_days_percentage,

    round(sum((ln.latest_nav * us.total_units) - (n7.nav_7d * us.total_units)) 
          over () / nullif(sum(n7.nav_7d * us.total_units) over (), 0), 8) 
          as consolidated_perf_7_days_percentage,

    round(sum((ln.latest_nav * us.total_units) - (n14.nav_14d * us.total_units)) 
          over () / nullif(sum(n14.nav_14d * us.total_units) over (), 0), 8) 
          as consolidated_perf_14_days_percentage,

    round(sum((ln.latest_nav * us.total_units) - (n30.nav_30d * us.total_units)) 
          over () / nullif(sum(n30.nav_30d * us.total_units) over (), 0), 8) 
          as consolidated_perf_30_days_percentage

from personal_finance.default.mf_list mf
join units_summary us on mf.fund_id = us.fund_id
left join latest_nav ln on mf.fund_id = ln.fund_id
left join nav_7_days_ago n7 on mf.fund_id = n7.fund_id
left join nav_14_days_ago n14 on mf.fund_id = n14.fund_id
left join nav_30_days_ago n30 on mf.fund_id = n30.fund_id
where (:fund_name = 'All' or mf.fund_name = :fund_name)
order by profit_7_days desc;

datasets.name: 4c2eb2f1
queryLines:
with latest_nav as (
    select fund_id, nav, date
    from personal_finance.default.mf_historical_data as a
    where date = (
        select max(date)
        from personal_finance.default.mf_historical_data as b
        where a.fund_id = b.fund_id
    )
)
select 
    mp.fund_id, 
    mf.fund_name, 
    mf.fund_house, 
    mp.transaction_date, 
    mp.transaction_type, 
    mp.units, 
    ln.nav as latest_nav_price, 
    ln.date as latest_nav_date,
    ln.nav * mp.units as latest_nav_value,  
    mhd.nav * mp.units as transaction_price, 
    ln.nav * mp.units - mhd.nav * mp.units as profit,
    sum(mp.units * mhd.nav) over (partition by mf.fund_name) as total_invested,
    sum(mp.units * ln.nav) over (partition by mf.fund_name) as total_current_value,
    (sum(mp.units * ln.nav) over (partition by mf.fund_name) - sum(mp.units * mhd.nav) over (partition by mf.fund_name)) / sum(mp.units * mhd.nav) over (partition by mf.fund_name) * 100 as profit_percentage,
    -- Consolidated profit percentage across all funds
    (sum(mp.units * ln.nav) over () - sum(mp.units * mhd.nav) over ()) / sum(mp.units * mhd.nav) over () as consolidated_profit_percentage
from personal_finance.default.mf_payments mp
join personal_finance.default.mf_list mf on mp.fund_id = mf.fund_id
left join latest_nav ln on mp.fund_id = ln.fund_id
left join personal_finance.default.mf_historical_data mhd on mp.fund_id = mhd.fund_id and mp.transaction_date = mhd.date
order by mp.transaction_date desc;

datasets.name: a7dce33e
queryLines:
with latest_nav as (
    select fund_id, nav, date
    from personal_finance.default.mf_historical_data as a
    where date = (
        select max(date)
        from personal_finance.default.mf_historical_data as b
        where a.fund_id = b.fund_id
    )
),
mf_summary as (
    select
        "Mutual Fund" as investment_type,
        sum(mp.units * mhd.nav) as total_invested,
        sum(mp.units * ln.nav) as current_value,
        sum(mp.units * ln.nav) - sum(mp.units * mhd.nav) as total_returns
    from personal_finance.default.mf_payments mp
    join personal_finance.default.mf_list mf on mp.fund_id = mf.fund_id
    left join latest_nav ln on mp.fund_id = ln.fund_id
    left join personal_finance.default.mf_historical_data mhd on mp.fund_id = mhd.fund_id and mp.transaction_date = mhd.date
),
chit_summary as (
    select 
        "Chit Fund" as investment_type,
        sum(cl.monthly_amount) - sum((cl.chit_amount - (cp.bid_amount - (cl.chit_amount * cl.commision))) / cl.total_tenure) as total_invested,
        sum(cl.monthly_amount) as current_value,
        sum((cl.chit_amount - (cp.bid_amount - (cl.chit_amount * cl.commision))) / cl.total_tenure) as total_returns
    from personal_finance.default.chit_payments cp
    join personal_finance.default.chit_list cl on cp.chit_id = cl.chit_id
    join personal_finance.default.chit_providers cpp on cpp.provider_id = cl.provider_id
),
bond_summary as (
    SELECT "Bond" as investment_type, 
    sum(invested_amount) as total_invested, 
    sum(face_value) as current_value,
    sum(face_value - invested_amount) as total_returns
    FROM personal_finance.default.bond_list 
    where frequency_of_principal_repayment <> "Quarterly"   
),
chit_and_mf_summary as (select * from mf_summary
union all
select * from chit_summary
union all 
select * from bond_summary
)
select * from chit_and_mf_summary

datasets.name: fba1dd4f
queryLines:
with latest_nav as (
    select fund_id, nav, date
    from personal_finance.default.mf_historical_data as a
    where date = (
        select max(date)
        from personal_finance.default.mf_historical_data as b
        where a.fund_id = b.fund_id
    )
),
mf_summary as (
    select
        "Mutual Fund" as investment_type,
        sum(mp.units * mhd.nav) as total_invested,
        sum(mp.units * ln.nav) as current_value,
        sum(mp.units * ln.nav) - sum(mp.units * mhd.nav) as total_returns,
        date_trunc('day', mp.transaction_date) as day
    from personal_finance.default.mf_payments mp
    join personal_finance.default.mf_list mf on mp.fund_id = mf.fund_id
    left join latest_nav ln on mp.fund_id = ln.fund_id
    left join personal_finance.default.mf_historical_data mhd on mp.fund_id = mhd.fund_id and mp.transaction_date = mhd.date
    group by day
),
chit_summary as (
    select 
        "Chit Fund" as investment_type,
        sum(cl.monthly_amount) - sum((cl.chit_amount - (cp.bid_amount - (cl.chit_amount * cl.commision))) / cl.total_tenure) as total_invested,
        sum(cl.monthly_amount) as current_value,
        sum((cl.chit_amount - (cp.bid_amount - (cl.chit_amount * cl.commision))) / cl.total_tenure) as total_returns,
        date_trunc('day', cp.payment_date) as day
    from personal_finance.default.chit_payments cp
    join personal_finance.default.chit_list cl on cp.chit_id = cl.chit_id
    join personal_finance.default.chit_providers cpp on cpp.provider_id = cl.provider_id
    group by day
),
bond_summary as (
    SELECT "Bond" as investment_type, 
    sum(invested_amount) as total_invested, 
    sum(face_value) as current_value,
    sum(face_value - invested_amount) as total_returns,
    date_trunc('day', date_of_investment) as day
    FROM personal_finance.default.bond_list 
    where frequency_of_principal_repayment <> "Quarterly"
    group by day
),
chit_and_mf_summary as (
    select day, sum(total_invested) as total_invested, sum(current_value) as current_value, sum(total_returns) as total_returns
    from (
        select day, total_invested, current_value, total_returns from mf_summary
        union all
        select day, total_invested, current_value, total_returns from chit_summary
        union all 
        select day, total_invested, current_value, total_returns from bond_summary
    ) as combined_summary
    group by day
)
select day, 
       sum(total_invested) as total_invested, 
       sum(current_value) as current_value, 
       sum(total_returns) as total_returns,
       sum(sum(total_invested)) over (order by day) as cumulative_total_invested,
       sum(sum(current_value)) over (order by day) as cumulative_current_value,
       sum(sum(total_returns)) over (order by day) as cumulative_total_returns
from chit_and_mf_summary
group by day
order by day
